maser.utils.cdf.leapsec module¶

leapsec.py.

Python module to load and handle a NAIF SPICE LeapSecond Kernels (lsk) file.

class maser.utils.cdf.leapsec.Lstable(file='https://cdf.gsfc.nasa.gov/html/CDFLeapSeconds.txt')[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for the leapsec table.

get_leapsec(date=datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 20, 16, 16, 0, 541800))[source]¶

Return the leapseconds for a given datetime.

get_lstable(target_dir='.')[source]¶

Download the Leapsec table file in the target_dir.
